name: Caregiver Saathi: Companions for Caregivers
description: Caregiver Saathi serves as the dedicated companion for caregivers. We are committed to recognising and supporting caregivers by providing comprehensive, end-to-end services for caregivers and their loved ones in need of care, offering a wide array of resources, programs, support groups and an intuitive app to help manage care effectively. Being a caregiver to a loved one facing a terminal illness or chronic condition is an incredibly challenging journey. There are everyday challenges of a whole new life -with visits to the doctor, the struggles of discovering that your loved one is ill and the challenges of keeping the spirits up for the loved one and even, for the rest of the family. Often, the new situation is so overwhelming and consuming that the caregiver simply goes about doing their best without really paying attention to themselves. Emotions like anger and pain at the situation, sometimes guilt of not looking after the patient as well as they wished to, guilt of thinking about themselves and the loss of one’s life as one had hoped it to be. Given the social context in India, most caregivers feel such emotions have no place.
features: We will partner with you in running a diagnostic and implementing actions that will enable you to be a caregiver friendly and inclusive workplace.
We conduct training programs and workshops for leadership, managers, employees and their families to enable them to make critical decisions in any form.
As a corporate partner you will get access to curated caregiving services to support employees and their families.
Headline: Companions for Caregivers in their journey
ShortDescription: Caregiver Saathi serves as the dedicated companion for caregivers.
enhanced_description: Caregiver Saathi is a dedicated companion for caregivers navigating the challenging journey of supporting loved ones with terminal or chronic conditions. The platform offers comprehensive, end-to-end services including a wide array of resources, programs, support groups, and an intuitive app to help manage care effectively. Beyond individual support, Caregiver Saathi partners with corporations to foster caregiver-friendly and inclusive workplaces. They provide diagnostic services, implement actions, and conduct training programs and workshops for leadership, managers, employees, and their families to enable critical decision-making. Corporate partners also gain access to curated caregiving services to support their employees and their families, ultimately aiming to improve employee happiness and engagement.
